text: Hello, I would like to talk to you about making a donation to Save the Children
Okay, if you don
Your donation will help to ensure children's rights to healthcare, education, safety, etc
Does this money that goes for donation stay here in the United States?
No, not all of it will stay in the United states
Is there a specific age or race of children that Save the Children are looking to benefit?
No, they don't have any prejudice like that, it's strictly to help children in general who are in need
This allows doctors to go to other countries? I am trying to understand how it is decided what child in need gets the help.
This link will give you all the information you seek  URL
Okay I will be sure and research the organization to better understand.
Ok Great, How much would you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all of your payment ($2).
Lets do $1.00 for now but I am glad you have made me aware of an organization that I can look into in order to help others.
Thank you so much for your donation, every bit helps :)
No problem. I do understand how every little bit helps and how we do not have to give as much if we can get others involved and for a good cause.
Ok, The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children.
Sounds great. Is there are reason that you have chosen to raise money for Save the Children?
I believe every child deserves the chance to have food in their bellies and an education to be able to help others when they get to adulthood.
This is so true. The reason I ask is because I have cared for abused and neglected children and see the results and how it effects them for the rest of their lives.
Yes, I sure hope we are able to raise a lot of money for this very worthy cause.
I am very curious to how the decision is made and what type of medical care they plan to deliver.
